channel.title: Client Running Help
channel.description:
When i Run.bat on a client it gives the usual message
'JAVA' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
idk if its my variables or what i had jdk6 u3 and it wrked but now that i got jdk6 u 4 it dnt so if its my variables could some 1 give me the variables for jdk6u4
